mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_name, d.emp_dept_name AS 'dept_name', CONCAT( COALESCE(LPAD(HOUR(ch.work_start_time), 2, '0'), '-'), ':', COALESCE(LPAD(MINUTE(ch.work_start_time), 2, '0'), '-') ) AS work_start, CONCAT( COALESCE(LPAD(HOUR(ch.work_end_time), 2, '0'), '-'), ':', COALESCE(LPAD(MINUTE(ch.work_end_time), 2, '0'), '-') ) AS work_end, COALESCE( (SELECT CONCAT( COALESCE(LPAD(HOUR(vh.vaca_start), 2, '0'), '-'), ':', COALESCE(LPAD(MINUTE(vh.vaca_start), 2, '0'), '-') )FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.vaca_date = #{date} AND e.emp_id = vh.emp_id), '-' ) AS vaca_start, COALESCE( (SELECT CONCAT( COALESCE(LPAD(HOUR(vh.vaca_end_time), 2, '0'), '0'), ':', COALESCE(LPAD(MINUTE(vh.vaca_end_time), 2, '0'), '0') )FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.vaca_date = #{date} AND e.emp_id = vh.emp_id), '-' ) AS vaca_end, COALESCE( (SELECT vh.use_hour FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.vaca_date = #{date} AND e.emp_id = vh.emp_id), '-' ) AS use_hour, CONCAT( COALESCE(LPAD(HOUR(ch.work_started), 2, '0'), '00'), ':', COALESCE(LPAD(MINUTE(ch.work_started), 2, '0'), '00') ) AS work_started, CONCAT( COALESCE(LPAD(HOUR(ch.work_ended), 2, '0'), '00'), ':', COALESCE(LPAD(MINUTE(ch.work_ended), 2, '0'), '00') ) AS work_ended, ch.work_state, COALESCE( (SELECT f.ori_file_name FROM file f WHERE f.file_kind = 5 AND e.emp_id = f.file_kind_idx), 'default' ) AS ori_file_name, COALESCE( (SELECT f.new_file_name FROM file f WHERE f.file_kind = 5 AND e.emp_id = f.file_kind_idx), 'default' ) AS new_file_name FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx JOIN commute_history ch ON e.emp_id = ch.emp_id WHERE ch.work_day = #{date} LIMIT 10 offset #{offset};
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(emp_id)/#{param1}) AS pages FROM employee;

SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_name, e.hiredate, d.emp_dept_name, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(ev.add_hour) FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE ev.emp_id = e.emp_id), 0) AS totalhour, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(vh.use_hour) FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.emp_id = e.emp_id), 0) AS usehour, (COALESCE((SELECT SUM(ev.add_hour) FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE ev.emp_id = e.emp_id), 0) - COALESCE((SELECT SUM(vh.use_hour) FROM vacation_history vh WHERE vh.emp_id = e.emp_id), 0)) AS remainhour, COALESCE ((SELECT SUM(add_hour) FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE ev.emp_id = e.emp_id AND vaca_name = '연차'), 0) AS yearhour, COALESCE ((SELECT SUM(add_hour) FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE ev.emp_id = e.emp_id AND vaca_name = '월차'), 0) AS monthhour, COALESCE ((SELECT SUM(add_hour) FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE ev.emp_id = e.emp_id AND vaca_name = '이월'), 0) AS overhour, COALESCE ((SELECT SUM(add_hour) FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE ev.emp_id = e.emp_id AND vaca_name = '조정연차'), 0) AS createhour FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.emp_dept_idx = d.emp_dept_idx WHERE emp_id = #{login_id};
SELECT add_date, del_date, add_hour, add_vaca_reason FROM emp_vacation ev WHERE emp_id = #{login_id};
